content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the taurage district court the court decided to dissolve a marriage between two individuals referred to as the applicant and the defendant the applicant was awarded movable property including a bmw and a citroen while the defendant was awarded immovable property specifically a garage and a mercedesbenz the court discussed three articles from the civil code related to the termination of matrimonial property the applicant requested the dissolution of the marriage due to psychological violence and control by the defendant they also requested the division of matrimonial property including the mentioned vehicles and the garage the court will decide on the division of the community property and may award the requested assets to each party the applicant also requested monetary compensation for the defendants property and the court will order the defendant to pay the applicants legal costs the marriage between rk and žk has been dissolved and the matrimonial property will be divided accordingly
